MathExpression.Script: choose('Brake Pressure Rear' [psi] <= 50 OR ( abs('Wheel Speed Rear Left' [in/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [in/s]) / ( 75 * 0.10472 ) ) <= 10, abs('Wheel Speed Rear Left' [in/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [in/s]) / 10, invalid())

( ( ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Drive' [m/s] * 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] ) / ( 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] + ( 'Rear track' [m] / 2 ) ) ) - ( ( 'Wheel Speed Rear Drive' [m/s] * 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] ) / ( 'Instantanius Corner Radius' [m] - ( 'Rear track' [m] / 2 ) ) ) ) / 10
( 'Wheel Speed Rear Left' [m/s] - 'Wheel Speed Rear Right' [m/s] ) * - 1

choose(( 'Corr Speed' [km/h] > 10 AND abs('Vehicle Acceleration Lateral' [G]) > .1 AND 'Coasting' == 1 ), ( 'Vehicle Acceleration Lateral' [m/s/s] / 'Corr Speed' [m/s] * 'Rear track' [m] ), invalid())
